poliastro2.core.threebody¶

Description¶

This subpackage contains routines for solving the three-body problem, including characteristic quantity computations and flyby dynamics.

Modules¶

  • cr3bp_char_quant: A Class for computing and storing characteristic quantities in the CR3BP.

  • flybys: Functions for computing flybys.

  • restricted: Solutions for the restricted three-body problem.

Modules

cr3bp_char_quant

@author: Dhruv Jain, Multi-Body Dynamics Research Group, Purdue University.

flybys

restricted

Circular Restricted 3-Body Problem (CR3BP).
